This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled "Explore your accessibility options".

City Commission

The City of Canyon City Commission consists of 5 members elected at large.  Commissioners can be contacted by email or by calling 806-655-5000 ext. 223.  

Mayor Place 1 - Gary Hinders
ghinders@canyontx.com

Mayor Pro-Tem Place 2 - Cody Jones
cjones@canyontx.com

Commissioner Place 3 - Paul R. Lyons
plyons@canyontx.com

Commissioner Place 4 - Robyn Cranmer
rcranmer@canyontx.com

Commissioner Place 5 - Danny J. Potter
dpotter@canyontx.com 

Meetings

  • 4:30 pm - Be sure to check the calendar to verify time.
  • First and Third Tuesday of each month
  • City Hall, 301 16th St.
  • Occasional exceptions may be made, Please check the Calendar for more information.

Commission Agendas and Minutes

Agendas, Minutes and Legal Notices are available for viewing. Agendas will be posted 72 hours before the scheduled City of Canyon Commission meetings. Minutes will be posted once approved by the City Commission. Archives of Agendas and Minutes and Legal or Public Notices are maintained in the document center for 2 years.

  2. How do I volunteer to serve on a City Board?
